__e: One can talk to a doctor, one can get medicial help...
Hey, now that you're famous, it should be easy to get you some medical help.
Just waiting on medical equipment for my sister.
I can't give you expensive equipment. I know. You don't have to.
- Good. There's still a lot of medical supplies down in the basement. No telling when we'll come across a cache like this again.
They do have a medicinal application, but no one would pay what I was supposed to get if they were just simple medications.
Also have epicondylitis in my elbow due to my mess-you-up breaking ball. You know, if you just want to bake, that's okay with me.
I need the rest of it, for medicinal purposes.
I thought you didn't wanna try medical marijuana.
Is this a medical marijuana facility?
Medical teams are on their way to treat the wounded.
Maybe you need time in medical care.
You'll get medical attention as soon as we're on the ground.
